name: Housing Accessibility Modifications Program
description: Grants for home modifications to improve accessibility for disabled and elderly persons
fullDescription: The Center for Independence of Individuals with Disabilities provides grants for home accessibility modifications, helping seniors and disabled persons remain safely in their homes.
whatTheyOffer:
- Grants for home modifications
- Wheelchair ramp installation
- Grab bar installation
- Bathroom accessibility upgrades
- Doorway widening
- Other accessibility improvements
howToGetIt:
1. Contact CID San Mateo
2. Complete application process
3. Demonstrate disability or age eligibility
4. Home assessment conducted
5. Modifications approved and scheduled
6. Work completed at no cost
address: 2001 Winward Way, Suite 103, San Mateo, CA 94404
